page1.title: Welcome to ForKobo Ecommerce
page1.description: Discover a world of endless possibilities. ForKobo is your all-in-one marketplace where shopping, selling, and supporting your community come together.

page2.title: Shop Your Favorite Brands
page2.description: Find top products from the brands you already love. From everyday essentials to unique finds, everything you need is just a tap away.

page3.title: Support Small Local Businesses
page3.description: Every purchase makes a difference. Explore products from small and local sellers, and help communities grow while enjoying authentic, high-quality items.

page4.title: Setup Your Own Store in Seconds
page4.description: Turn your idea into a business instantly. Create your online store, showcase products, and start sellingâ€”all with just a few clicks, no hassle required.
